name: Caduet
indications: caduet ( amlodipine atorvastatin ) indicated patients treatment amlodipine atorvastatin appropriate .
contraindications: usual starting dose ( mg daily ) maximum dose ( mg daily ) amlodipine 5 start small adults children , fragile , elderly patients , patients hepatic insufficiency 2.5 mg daily ( 2 ) . 10 atorvastatin 10–20 start patients requiring large ldl-c reduction ( > 45 % ) 40 mg daily ( 2 ) . 80
warningsAndPrecautions: caduet® tablets contain amlodipine besylate atorvastatin calcium equivalent amlodipine atorvastatin dose strengths described . caduet tablets differentiated tablet color/size engraved unique number one side . combinations atorvastatin 5 mg amlodipine oval film-coated white tablets combinations atorvastatin 10 mg amlodipine oval film-coated blue tablets . caduet tablets supplied oral following strengths package configurations : table 16. caduet packaging configurations caduet package configuration tablet strength mg ( amlodipine / atorvastatin ) ndc # engraving side 1 / side 2 tablet color tablet shape bottle 30 5/10 0069-2150-30 0069-6180-30 cdt 051/pfizer white oval bottle 30 5/20 0069-2170-30 0069-6323-30 cdt 052/pfizer white oval bottle 30 5/40 0069-2190-30 0069-6565-30 cdt 054/pfizer white oval bottle 30 5/80 0069-2260-30 0069-6747-30 cdt 058/pfizer white oval bottle 30 10/10 0069-2160-30 0069-7810-30 cdt 101/pfizer blue oval bottle 30 10/20 0069-2180-30 0069-7232-30 cdt 102/pfizer blue oval bottle 30 10/40 0069-2250-30 0069-7654-30 cdt 104/pfizer blue oval bottle 30 10/80 0069-2270-30 0069-7476-30 cdt 108/pfizer blue oval
adverseReactions: •acute liver failure decompensated cirrhosis [ ( 5.3 ) ] . •hypersensitivity amlodipine , atorvastatin excipients ‎caduet . hypersensitivity , including anaphylaxis , angioneurotic edema , erythema multiforme , stevens-johnson syndrome , toxic epidermal necrolysis , reported [ ( 6.2 ) ] .
indications_original: CADUET (amlodipine and atorvastatin) is indicated in patients for whom treatment with both amlodipine and atorvastatin is appropriate.
contraindications_original: Usual starting dose (mg daily) Maximum dose (mg daily) Amlodipine 5 Start small adults or children, fragile, or elderly patients, or patients with hepatic insufficiency on 2.5 mg once daily ( 2 ). 10 Atorvastatin 10–20 Start patients requiring large LDL-C reduction (> 45%) at 40 mg once daily ( 2 ). 80
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
CADUET® tablets contain amlodipine besylate and atorvastatin calcium equivalent to amlodipine and atorvastatin in the dose strengths described below.
                  CADUET tablets are differentiated by tablet color/size and are engraved with a unique number on one side. Combinations of atorvastatin with 5 mg amlodipine are oval and film-coated white tablets and combinations of atorvastatin with 10 mg amlodipine are oval and are film-coated blue tablets. CADUET tablets are supplied for oral administration in the following strengths and package configurations:
                  
                     Table 16. CADUET Packaging Configurations

adverseReactions_original:
•Acute liver failure or decompensated cirrhosis [see Warnings and Precautions (5.3)].
                     
                        •Hypersensitivity to amlodipine, atorvastatin or any excipients in ‎CADUET. Hypersensitivity reactions, including anaphylaxis, angioneurotic edema, erythema multiforme, Stevens-Johnson syndrome, and toxic epidermal necrolysis, have been reported [see Adverse Reactions (6.2)].
